class.name: PlaneShape
class.description: An infinite plane shape for 3D collisions. Note that the [Plane]'s normal matters; anything "below" the plane will collide with it. If the [PlaneShape] is used in a [PhysicsBody], it will cause colliding objects placed "below" it to teleport "above" the plane.

members.member: The [Plane] used by the [PlaneShape] for collision.
